title: Strategic System Engineer
summary: The people here at Apple don’t just create products — they create the kind of wonder that’s revolutionized entire industries! It’s the diversity of those people and their ideas that inspires the innovation that runs through everything we do, from amazing technology to industry-leading environmental efforts. Join Apple, and help us leave the world better than we found it! Our sales team, is in many ways, the face of Apple to our largest customers.
description: We are trusted advisors on the Apple ecosystem, business transformation and Apple platform adoption. We deeply understand our customers’ business and technical ambitions. We help remove technical barriers and friction points, and enhance customer readiness for our platform. We create new standard methodologies and share them. We work multi-functionally across Apple, our Major Accounts’ organizations, channel and other strategic solution partners to change the way people work. Apple doesn’t cut corners, in products or in business. You bring the highest level of integrity, honesty, and accountability in all that you do, every single day. You are a trusted advisor who does what you say you’ll do – and always does what’s best for Apple.
key_qualifications: Experience advising on technical business transformation solutions for large enterprises or at least 6 years of experience in a consultative sales engineering role. Bring IT knowledge and have experience in the areas of enterprise messaging, collaboration, Wi-Fi, client management solutions, and enterprise security technologies for iOS, macOS, and competing platforms. Adeptly articulate the benefits of modern deployment methods to your customers and describe the nuances of deploying and managing the Apple platform in large organizations...
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $134,700 and $202,400, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location. Apple employees also have the opportunity to become an Apple shareholder through participation in Apple’s discretionary employee stock programs...
